lines.text: I can't understand... how it's possible... to live your whole life... without someone... and be doing more or less OK. And then suddenly you find them.
You recognize them. And... you know without them...

[Recorded greeting on Michele and Lulu's answering machine]
This is Lulu and Michele. We're not here, so go to hell! But if you're not a horny creep, leave a message at the beep!

[complaining to a detective who offended him]
Son of a bitch. I'm sick of all this name calling crap!
